titleStmt.title: A relation of the triall made before the King of France, vpon the yeare 1600 betvveene the Bishop of Eureux, and the L. Plessis Mornay About certayne pointes of corrupting and falsifying authors, wherof the said Plessis was openly conuicted. Newly reuewed, and sett forth againe, with a defence therof, against the impugnations both of the L. Plessis in France, & of O.E. in England. By N.D.
titleStmt.author: Parsons, Robert, 1546-1610.

titleStmt.title: A relation of the triall made before the King of France, vpon the yeare 1600 betvveene the Bishop of Eureux, and the L. Plessis Mornay About certayne pointes of corrupting and falsifying authors, wherof the said Plessis was openly conuicted. Newly reuewed, and sett forth againe, with a defence therof, against the impugnations both of the L. Plessis in France, & of O.E. in England. By N.D.
titleStmt.author: Parsons, Robert, 1546-1610.

publicationStmt.date: Imprinted vvith licence. Anno M. DC. IIII. [1604]

notesStmt.note: N.D. = N. Doleman, i.e. Robert Parsons.
Place of publication and printer's name from STC.
Also issued as part 3 of STC 19416: Parsons, Robert. A treatise of three conversions of England.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

person.persName: Mornay, Philippe de, seigneur du Plessis-Marly,
